name: Kowdiar
source: Median calculated from specific listed prices: Land prices ranged from 17 to 30 lakhs per cent in prime Kowdiar listings. Apartment prices ranged from ₹7,426 to ₹11,587 per sqft, with the median derived from specific listings like WELL HEAVEN and HEERA HIGH LIFE.
reasoning: Kowdiar is Trivandrum's most prestigious residential area (5.0), boasting excellent educational facilities and high green cover (4.8). However, its primary functional drawbacks stem from high traffic, noise, severe parking constraints mentioned in reviews, and explicit reports of poor street lighting along the main stretch (2.5), despite its high general safety score.
